scripts.build:
npx tailwindcss --input ./public/app.css --output ./public/assets/app-gen.css && esbuild app.js --platform=node --external:express --format=esm --bundle --outfile=bin/shellconf && printf "%s
%s
" "#!/usr/bin/env node" "$(cat bin/shellconf)" >bin/shellconf && chmod +x bin/shellconf && npm link
